ygData.subject: Hunting grounds for lvl 12-13
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail all, I hate to admit this but im having trouble finding groups to play with... It seems that everyone wants a lvl 14 or so cleric cos they can heal more,
ygData.messageBody:
Hail all,

I hate to admit this but im having trouble finding groups to play with... It
seems that everyone wants a lvl 14 or so cleric cos they can heal more, and
admittedly i have problems keeping up with the damage that creatures a few
lvls higher than me can dish out (being only able to heal 30 a pop). so i
was wondering if anyone knows of a good hunting place i could check out at
lvl 12 and 13 (one bar left till 13 woo).

thanks
Gwaihir
Cazic-Thule
